data: `minecraft:entity_sensor` is a component that fires an event when a set of conditions are met by other entities within the defined range.

data.Name: [event_filters](../FilterList.md)
data.Description: The set of conditions that must be satisfied to fire the event.

data.Name: event
data.Description: Event to fire when the conditions are met.

data.Name: maximum_count
data.Description: The maximum number of entities that must pass the filter conditions for the event to send.

data.Name: minimum_count
data.Description: The minimum number of entities that must pass the filter conditions for the event to send.

data.Name: relative_range
data.Description: If true the sensor range is additive on top of the entity's size.

data.Name: require_all
data.Description: If true requires all nearby entities to pass the filter conditions for the event to send.

data.Name: sensor_range
data.Description: The maximum distance another entity can be from this and have the filters checked against it.
